item.title: Ethereum Went From Trustless To A Political Ecosystem Since The Hard Fork
item.description:
Ethereum Went From Trustless To A Political Ecosystem Since The Hard Fork

There still seems to be a lot of confusion regarding the outcome of the Ethereum hard fork. The majority of the focus has been on ensuring The DAO investors will be reimbursed after a hacker exploit a code bug allowing him to drain tens of millions of dollars from the project.

item.title: "No More Ransom" Initiative Wants To End Ransomware
item.description:
"No More Ransom" Initiative Wants To End Ransomware

The fight against ransomware is in full effect, as some of the biggest players in the industry are teaming up. A new collaboration between Intel, Kaspersky, and Europol, seeks to shut down down ransomware once and for all.

item.title: David Seaman: Ethereum Classic 'Little More Than Troll Vaporware'
item.description:
David Seaman: Ethereum Classic 'Little More Than Troll Vaporware'

Bitcoin.com spoke with independent journalist and cryptocurrency enthusiast David Seaman on the Ethereum split, the anti-climatic Bitcoin halving event and why users should stop bullying Coinbase for helping law enforcement snatch the founder of KickAssTorrents.

item.title: Bitcoin not money, Miami judge rules in dismissing laundering charges
item.description:
Bitcoin not money, Miami judge rules in dismissing laundering charges

Bitcoin does not actually qualify as money, a Miami-Dade judge ruled Monday in throwing out criminal charges against a Miami Beach man charged with illegally selling the virtual currency. Monday's decision came in a case that is being closely watched in tech, financial and legal circles as the popularity of the virtual currency has skyrocketed in recent years.

item.title: Gibraltar Stock Exchange Lists First Bitcoin Investment Product
item.description:
Gibraltar Stock Exchange Lists First Bitcoin Investment Product

An asset-backed Exchange Traded Instrument which has invested exclusively in Bitcoin, BitcoinETI, has become the first European regulated product for the leading digital currency after it was approved for admission to listing on the Gibraltar Stock Exchange GSX on 22 July 2015, the Gibraltar-based private limited company has announced.

item.title: MinerGate Adds Support for Mining Ethereum Classic
item.description:
MinerGate Adds Support for Mining Ethereum Classic

Minergate, a mining pool and the developer of GUI mining software that supports various mining various cryptocurrencies including bitcoin and Ethereum, is including support for Ethereum classic, the blockchain based on the original Ethereum platform's consensus before the hard fork.

item.title: Bitcoin Isn't Money, Florida Judge Rules in Laundering Case
item.description:
Bitcoin Isn't Money, Florida Judge Rules in Laundering Case

A landmark criminal case believed to be the first involving a money-laundering charge involving bitcoin has seen its verdict. The criminal charges thrown out, with bitcoin not deemed to qualify as money, according to the ruling judge. Defendant Michell Espinoza was arrested in 201andmd charged with "illegally selling and laundering" $1,500 in bitcoin to an undercover law enforcement officer.

item.title: Bitcoin Scam Site Warning - 10Bitz
item.description:
Bitcoin Scam Site Warning - 10Bitz

The time has come to look at yet another Bitcoin Ponzi Scheme, of which there are far more than one can count these days. 10Bitz offers some interesting rewards for investors, but no one should expect any legitimacy from this company whatsoever. Earning 10% daily forever sounds quite appealing, but funds will dry up eventually.

item.title: How to Maintain and Repair Dual-X and Other Non-Serviceable GPU Fans
item.description:
How to Maintain and Repair Dual-X and Other Non-Serviceable GPU Fans

There are a lot of people that use various GPUs for mining with the stock fans that the video card comes with and normally many of these fans start to have issues in just a couple of months or after a year or so.

item.title: The 6 best Bitcoin mining software
item.description:
The 6 best Bitcoin mining software

Are you thinking of joining the Bitcoin mining universe? In case you don't know, you can either mine on your own or as part of a pool.
